SA15bsa0556u:3_0: tatra na tāvat kramaḥ kramāṇāmekaikaṃ prati pūrvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākarttṛtvāpatteḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:3_2: tatra ca sphuṭa taraḥ pūrvvāparakālayoḥ karttṛtvākartṛtvaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:3_3: virudve ca karttṛtvākarttṛtve ekadharmmiṇi na sambhavataḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:3_4: ekasvabhāvaśca tāvatkālamakṣaṇika iti sidva etasmin kramayaugapadyayorayogaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:3_5: tadevamakṣaṇike vyāpakānupalabdhyā niṣidvaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika evā[va] tiṣṭhate iti kṣaṇikatvena vyāptaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:3_6: tattena vyāptaṃ yat yatra dharmmiṇi sidhyati tatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ prasādhayati /
SA15bsa0556u:3_7: idamevedānīṃ vicāryyate / keyaṃ (kveyaṃ) vyāptigrahītavyā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi sādhyadharmmiṇi vā /
SA15bsa0556u:4_1: hetumātrasya dṛṣṭasya vyāptiḥ pakṣe tu gamyate //
SA15bsa0556u:5_0: pratyakṣadṛṣṭayorvanhidhūmayoḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvasidvau tayorvyāptisidviriti pratyakṣasidve vanhau yuktamanumānavaiphalyam /
SA15bsa0556u:5_1: naivaṃ vyāptisidveḥ prāk pramāṇāntarasidvaṃ dharmmiṇi kṣaṇikatvam /
SA15bsa0556u:5_2: sādhanadharmmameva tu kevalamanupaśyanto viparyyaye bādhakapramāṇavalāttasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ pratīmaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:5_3: tattataḥ sādhanavaiphalyam / vaiphalyameva, kṣaṇikatvavyāptasya sattvasya tathātvena dharmmiṇi pratītau kṣaṇikatvasyāpi pratīteriti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:5_6: tadyathā / yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti / na punaryatra mahānase dhūmastatrāgniriti /
SA15bsa0556u:5_7: evamihāpi yat sattatkṣaṇikamiti vyāptipratītau sādhanadharmmasyāpi dharmmiṇi sattvaṃ nāntarbhavati /
SA15bsa0556u:5_8_0: kiṃ punaḥ sādhyadharmmasya / tasmāt sattvasāmānyasya sādhanadharmmasya pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptiścaikaśaḥ pratipādya tadubhayasāmarthyāt
SA15bsa0556u:5_8_1: sādhyadharmmasya dharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ pratīyata iti kuto 'numānavaiphalyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:5_9: yadyevaṃ vyāptipratītāvasati dharmmiṇi parāmarśe sādhyadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇamiti /
SA15bsa0556u:5_13: nanu vyāptipakṣadharmmatvayorekaśaḥ pratītāvapi yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagatantasyaiva sādhyena vyāptiravasiteti sāmarthyāt sādhyasattākathanamavaiyarthyaṃ sādhanasya /
SA15bsa0556u:6_3: anyathā viśeṣayorvyāptiprasaṅgāt tadayaṃ vyastaviṣayaḥ sāmarthyāditi hetunirddeśaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_0: api ca gṛhīte pakṣadharmmatve sambandhe ca smṛte anumānaṃ bhavadbhiriṣyate /
SA15bsa0556u:7_2: na hi bahirvyāptivādināmapi vismṛtāyāṃ vyāptau anumānapravṛttirasti /
SA15bsa0556u:7_3: tatra yasyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ tasyaiva sādhyadharmmeṇa vyāptismṛteḥ kinna sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_9: ayogavyavacchedena viśeṣaṇānnāsādhāraṇateti cet tathāpi kinna sādhyadharmmī parāmṛśyate /
SA15bsa0556u:7_10_0: yatra yatra parvvate dhūmastatra tatrāgniryathā mahānasa iti sāmānyālambanāyāṃ vyāptau dharmmiviśeṣaparāmarśasyānaṅgatvāditi
SA15bsa0556u:7_10_1: cet yuktametat sādhyadharmmiṇā hyayogavyavacchedaḥ sādhanadharmmasya rūpāntarameva pakṣadhammatvākhyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_11_0: na tvayaṃ vyāpteraṅgaṃ / tamantareṇāpi vyāpteḥ sāmānyālambanāyāḥ paricchedaparisamāpteḥ kathamanyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇavārttāpi
SA15bsa0556u:7_12: pakṣadharmmatvagrahaṇe vā tadaiva sādhyamapi sāmarthyādasidvaṃ sidvamiti sarvvānumānavaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_13: paścātkālabhāviliṅgajñānamapi ca smṛtireva syāt na pramāṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_14: tasmāt vyāpteranaṅgatvāt pakṣadharmmatvaṃ vyāptigrahaṇe sadapi nāntarbhavatīti pṛthaggṛhītasmṛtayoḥ pakṣadharmmatvavyāptyoḥ sāmarthyādanumeyagatirutpadyate iti /
SA15bsa0556u:7_19: na tu trairupyapratīterantarbhāva iti sarvvaṃ samānaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:7_20: na sarvvaṃ samānaṃ / antarvyāptau hi vyāptiṃ prati gatyaiva pakṣadharmmatvamavagataṃ anavagate pakṣadharmmatve vyāpterapyanavagateḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:8_2: pratyakṣa iva dṛṣṭānte tatra setyanyathā kathaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:8_3: dvau dṛṣṭvā vidma iti ced vyāpteḥ prāk dvayadṛk kathaṃ //”
SA15bsa0556u:9_0: vyāptipakṣadharmmatve hi svavākyābhyāṃ yena tena prayuktābhyāṃ sūcyete na tu sākṣāt pratīyete /
SA15bsa0556u:10_1: sūcitayo 'stu tayoḥ sattve hetau prathamatarapakṣadharmmatvaviṣayameva pramāṇamabhimukhībhavatu /
SA15bsa0556u:10_2: tena pramāṇena dharmmiṇi sidvasya sattvasya paścādvyāptiḥ pramāṇāntareṇa gṛhyata iti kasya vaiyarthyamiti /
SA15bsa0556u:10_3: pratyakṣe 'pi dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi prathamaṃ heturgṛhyate paścādvyāptirityeṣa eva kramaḥ anyathā dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vyāptirgṛhītetyetadeva na syāt /
SA15bsa0556u:10_5: yadyevaṃ sādhyadharmmo 'pi vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi grahītabya eva yathā vanhidhūmayoriti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:10_6: na / tatra dṛṣṭasya hetorvipakṣe bādhakavṛttimātrādeva vyāptisidveḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:10_7: jñātaścaivaṃ na khalu vyāptigrahaṇāt prāk kṣaṇikasya kvacidapi sidvirasti tasyānumeyatvāt /
SA15bsa0556u:10_14: tatsidvau na vipakṣe bādhakavṛttiriti dvayadarśanavyapekṣā? vanhidhūmayorvyāptisidviḥ sattvakṣaṇikatvayostu naivaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:10_16: tasmāt sattvamātrasya tatra dharmmiṇi sidvasya bādhakavaśādvyāptiḥ setsyatītyeṣitavyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:10_17: tadvadantarvyāptāvapi / te ime vyāptipakṣadharmmatve svasvapramāṇavyavacchedyasādhanavākye na tu kevalaṃ sūcayitavye /
SA15bsa0556u:14_0: yadi hi dharmmiṇi vyāptiḥ sidhyantyeva sādhyasidvimantarbhāvayati /
SA15bsa0556u:14_1: nanu lābha evaiṣaḥ / byāptiprasādhakādeva pramāṇāt sādhyasidveḥ sattvahetvapāśrayaṇaprayāsasya nirasanāt /
SA15bsa0556u:14_4: na tarhyantarvyāptau hetuvaiyarthyamiti kimakāṇḍakātaratayā bahu taramāyāsamāviśasi /
SA15bsa0556u:14_5: dvayaṃ hi bhavataḥ sādhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi vṛttiḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi ca /
SA15bsa0556u:14_8: tadvahirbhūte ca dharmmiṇi vyāptigrahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ bhavedvaiyarthyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:14_9: yadā tu vastumātre vivādaḥ tadā sarvvavastuṣu hetorvṛttistvayāpi sādhyā mayāpi ceti katamasmin dharmmiṇi hetorvṛttisādhanaṃ mama vyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA15bsa0556u:14_12: bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttamānamantargatamapi dharmmiṇaṃ bahiṣkarotīti cet etadeva kathaṃ bhavatu bādhakena pravarttamānenaiva tasmin sādhyasādhanāt /
SA15bsa0556u:14_17: sandehānivṛttau na vahiṣkaraṇamavahiṣkṛtaśca sādhyadharmmyeveti tatra vyāptirantarvyāptireva nedānīṃ bahirvyāptervārttāpi /
SA15bsa0556u:14_18: tadiyaṃbahirvyāptiramusmin pakṣe kathaṃ bhavati yadi pratiniyate dharmmiṇi vivādaḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:15_2: vyāptigrahaḥ kathaṃ nasyāddṛṣṭānte 'pi na vā bhavet //
SA15bsa0556u:16_0: yatra hi dharmmiṇi dṛṣṭasya hetorvyāptiḥ pratīyate tatra tasya vyāptigrahaṇamākhyāyate /
SA15bsa0556u:16_1: dṛṣṭañca sādhyadharmmiṇi sattvamanyathā vimatyayogāditi kathaṃ nāntarvyāptiḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:17_0: tathāpi sādhanavaiyarthyaniṣedhāya bahireva gṛhṇīma iti cet tat kimidānīṃ tvadicchānurodhāt dharmmiṇi hetorddarśanamadarśanamastu /
SA15bsa0556u:17_2: ubhayatra dṛṣṭasya vyāptigrahaṇe 'pyasti bahirvyāptibhāga iti cet /
SA15bsa0556u:18_1: nanu yadi bādhakavṛttimātreṇa vyāptigrahaṇādhikaraṇe dharmmiṇi sādhyasidveḥ sādhanavaiyarthyamantarvyāptau tadetadvahirvyāptāvapi tulyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:18_2: tasmād vyasanamātraṃ bahirvyāptigrahaṇe viśeṣeṇa sattve hetau kevalaṃ jaḍadhiyāmeva niyamena dṛṣṭāntasāpekṣaḥ sādhanaprayogaḥ paritoṣāya jāyate /
SA15bsa0556u:22_0: kathamidānīṃ anumeye sattvameva sattvameva sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe vāsattvameva niścitamiti hetostrairupyamavagantavyam /
SA15bsa0556u:23_1: sattvāsattve tatra hetoste grāhye yatra tatra vā //”
SA15bsa0556u:24_1: atadyuktaścāsapakṣa iti / tasmin sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣe cāsattvameva yathākramamanvayavyatirekau tau punaryatra tatra vā dharmmiṇi grahītavyau yatra śakyau grahītum /
SA15bsa0556u:25_0: tadiha sattvasya sarvvato 'kṣaṇikādvyāvṛttau bādhakabalāt sidvāyāṃ yat sattat kṣaṇikameveti anvayaḥ sādhyadharmmiṇyavagṛhyate /
SA15bsa0556u:27_7: dhūmasāmānyavat / tataḥ sarvvopasaṃhāravatyāḥ vyāpteḥ sambhavāt sattvādivadadṛṣṭameva sādhanaṃ śrāvaṇatvākhyaṃ /
SA15bsa0556u:27_12: sādhya dharmmiṇi vyāptipratītāveva sādhyapratīteḥ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ syādeva /
SA15bsa0556u:28_0: samānañcaitadvahirvyāptivādināmapi yadi hi mūḍhamatāpekṣā na syāt syādeva śrāvaṇatvamaduṣṭo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0556u:29_0: dṛṣṭāntaḥ sarvvaśabdeṣu vigatau bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarttammanaṃ adṛṣṭāntamapi tatraikaṃ dṛṣṭāntayatīti kathama sādhāraṇamanaikāntikaṃ veti /
